Detailed Description

Hue - Saturation - Light frame.

To use this class :

  1. call init() method to initialize the HSL Frame
  2. grab() method to get a hsl frame
  3. and finally one getHuePixel() , getSaturationPixel() , getLightPixel() for get pixel from hsl frame.
